title: Exploration for internal and external portal for Juniper MIST
description:
Description
Exploration with: POs Frontend Factory, UX Designer, Product Offering, Processteam and User Community

Business Scope:
Exploration for preparing implementation epics, click dummies, customer- and user journey, specifications to implement the internal and external portal in Q4
acceptance_criteria: Click-Dummy for internal portal is done and documented
User Journey is done and documented
Epics for implementation (internal portal) are done and documented
Click-Dummy for external portal is done and documented
Customer Journey is done and documented
Epics for implementation (external portal) are done and documented
